The main goals of the ECIP network are:

- Collaborate on empirical studies and grant proposals that explicitly investigate causal effects involving personality
- Develop a tutorial and guidelines for causal inference in personality science
- Organize symposiums on causal inference in personality science at international conferences
- Give a pre-conference workshop for early career researchers on causal inference at the ECP 2022
- Foster collaboration between psychologists and economists
